channel.title: Java Problem
channel.description:
Running a 64x Bit
Everytime i run This Client i get an error
[code] C:\Users\Ron\Desktop>java -Xmx512m -jar SilabClient.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:\Users\Ron\Desktop>pause Press any key to continue . . .[/code] what shall i do?

item.title: Java Problem
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

you will need a 32 bit JDK, you can use “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_##\bin\java.exe”.

is the number of the version of JDK like jdk1.6.0_20 pr jdk1.6.0_21.

Read full topic
